visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a stacked horizontal bar chart. The chart should display the number of ferry passengers by vehicle type for the months of January to May in 2024. The chart should have a title 'Ferry passengers by vehicle type 2024' aligned to the left. The x-axis should display the months, and the y-axis should start from 0 with no title. The legend should be reversed, and data labels should be enabled for each series. The series should include 'Motorcycles', 'Null-emission vehicles', and 'Conventional vehicles' with their respective data. The chart should have a white background and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a stacked horizontal bar chart to display the number of ferry passengers categorized by vehicle type for the months of January to May in 2024. The chart's title is 'Ferry passengers by vehicle type 2024', aligned to the left, with a font size of 18px and a dark gray color. The x-axis displays the months with labels styled in a medium gray color and a font size of 14px. The y-axis starts from 0, has no title, and its labels are also styled in medium gray with a font size of 14px. The legend is reversed and styled with a font size of 14px and a medium gray color. Each series in the chart is stacked and includes data labels enabled with a font size of 12px and a dark gray color. The chart has a white background and a margin of 50 pixels on all sides to ensure readability and spacing.
